content: the petal pot by kennedy sahr @sahcrochet on instagram you will need ● a 6 5 mm k hook ● 1 skein of worsted weight yarn double stranded ● scissors ● tapestry needle abbreviations chain-chain single_crochet-single_crochet slip_stitch-slip_stitch decrease-single_crochet two stitches together skip-skip double_crochet-double_crochet blo-back loop only pot begin with a magic_ring chain 1 to start round 1 r1 r1 single_crochet 7 sts into circle tightening as needed 7 sts slip_stitch to first st r2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same st 2 single_crochet around 14 sts slip_stitch to first st r3 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat around 21 sts slip_stitch to first st r4 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat around 28 sts slip_stitch to first st r5 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat around 35 sts slip_stitch to first st r6 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat around 42 sts slip_stitch to first st r7 chain 1 single_crochet around r8 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease in next 2 sts repeat around 35 sts slip_stitch to first st r9-10 chain 1 single_crochet around 35 sts slip_stitch to first st do not cut yarn ​ ​ petals r1 *skip st blo 5 double_crochet in next st skip 1 st slip_stitch into next 2 st skip st* around 7 times total slip_stitch to first st cut yarn fasten_off weave in ends turn inside out press petals to make them even with top of pot thank you so much
